listener.description: defines a ServletContextListener that starts up the Shiro environment (including the Shiro SecurityManager) upon web application startup. By default, this listener automatically knows to look for our WEB-INF/shiro.ini file for Shiro configuration.

filter.description: defines the master ShiroFilter. This filter is expected to filter all requests into the web application so Shiro can peform necessary identity and access control operations before allowing a request to reach the application.
